results.title: Pleural effusions following the Fontan procedure.
results.text_hl: One prospective, randomized trial evaluated the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Pleural_Effusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010996 @@@pleural effusions@@@ after the Fontan procedure.

citations.NLM: Mascio CE, Austin EH 3rd. Pleural effusions following the Fontan procedure. Curr Opin Pulm Med. 2010 Jul;16(4):362-6. PMID: 20410822
citations.BibTeX: @article{20410822, title={Pleural effusions following the Fontan procedure.}, author={Mascio CE and Austin EH 3rd}, journal={Curr Opin Pulm Med}, volume={16}, number={4}, pages={362-6}}

results.title: [Eosinophilic pleuritic: An unusual complication of treatment with an angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor].
results.text_hl: OBSERVATION: We report the first case of @<m>DISEASE_Pleural_Effusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010996 @@@eosinophilic pleural effusion@@@ occurring due to @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Zouak A, Bongrain É, Launois C, Nardi J, Vella-Boucaud J, Deslee G, Lebargy F, Perotin JM. [Eosinophilic pleuritic: An unusual complication of treatment with an angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitor]. Rev Mal Respir. 2015 Sep;32(7):737-41. PMID: 26370487
